plot: Roger's wife has gone missing in the wake of a plague of serial killers terrorizing his home town. As he searches for answers, he realizes the truth is far more frightening than anything he could imagine.
title: The Asylum of Dr. Caligari
plot_es: Roger's wife has gone missing in the wake of a plague of serial killers terrorizing his home town. As he searches for answers, he realizes the truth is far more frightening than anything he could imagine.
plot_en: Roger's wife has gone missing in the wake of a plague of serial killers terrorizing his home town. As he searches for answers, he realizes the truth is far more frightening than anything he could imagine.
